metadata.name: Day in Vatican City
metadata.description:
"Day in Vatican City" -- Mohler. November 18th, 2021.
Video: 2 min 50 sec. 3840px w. 2160px h. 

Ai neural style transfer treatment of footage of the rooftops of Vatican City taken by Mohler in 2018. A continuation of the "Painted Cities" series which explores the subconscious of Ai and painted video. Part of the generative and Ai art movement. Full 2 min 50 sec video available on Vimeo and for collectors upon request. A special release for the ArtRepublic Art Basel 2021 exhibition. Sound by Luke Mombrea

See full Length 4k Version here: https://vimeo.com/649689002
